Uses of Class
org.interworldtransport.cladosG.Scale

Packages that use Scale
Package
Description
org.interworldtransport.cladosG
Provides the geometry classes and the structures needed for multi-algebra geometric models.

    protected <T extends ProtoN & Field & Normalizable>
    Scale<D>
    Scale.setWeightsArray(T[] pIn)
    This coefficient settor accepts an array of ProtoN numbers, assumes they are in basis index order, and then inserts them into the internal map by blade at that index.
    protected Scale<D>
    Scale.setWeightsAtGrade(byte pGrade, D[] pIn)
    This coefficient settor accepts an array of ProtoN children, assumes they are in basis index order, and then inserts them into the internal map by blade at that index offset in the amount necessary to cover ONLY the grade suggested by the byte parameter.
    protected Scale<D>
    Scale.setWeightsMap(Map<Blade,D> pInMap)
    This method sets the coefficients represented by this Scale.
    protected Scale<D>
    Scale.zeroAll()
    This method causes all coefficients to be set to zero using the offered cardinal.
    protected Scale<D>
    Scale.zeroAllButGrade(byte pGrade)
    This is a specialty method making use of setCoefficientsAtGrade for a specific purpose of grade suppression.

    This is a specialty method making use of setCoefficientsAtGrade for a specific purpose of grade suppression.
